text: This is a list of metro stations of Baku Metro in Baku, Azerbaijan. Currently, Baku Metro has 27 metro stations. Line 1 has 13 metro stations, Line 2 has 10 metro stations and Line 3 has 4 metro stations. == Metro stations == Line 1 Station Opening date Type Interchange İçərişəhər 6 November 1967 Underground station Sahil 6 November 1967 Underground station 28 May 6 November 1967 Underground station Line 2 Gənclik 6 November 1967 Underground station Nəriman Nərimanov 6 November 1967 Underground station Ulduz 5 May 1970 Underground station Koroğlu 6 November 1972 Underground station Qara Qarayev 6 November 1972 Underground station Neftçilər 6 November 1972 Underground station Bakmil 28 March 1979 Surface station Xalqlar Dostluğu 28 April 1989 Underground station Əhmədli 28 April 1989 Underground station Həzi Aslanov 10 December 2002 Underground station Line 2 Station Opening date Type Interchange Xətai 28 February 1968 Underground station Nizami 31 December 1976 Underground station Elmlər Akademiyası 31 December 1985 Underground station İnşaatçılar 31 December 1985 Underground station 20 Yanvar 31 December 1985 Underground station Memar Əcəmi 31 December 1985 Underground station Line 3 Cəfər Cabbarlı 27 December 1993 Underground station Line 1 Nəsimi 9 October 2008 Underground station Azadlıq prospekti 30 December 2009 Underground station Dərnəgül 29 June 2011 Underground station Line 3 Station Opening date Type Interchange Memar Əcəmi-2 19 April 2016 Underground station Line 2 Avtovağzal 19 April 2016 Underground station 8 Noyabr 29 May 2021 Underground station Xocəsən 23 December 2022 Surface station == Related pages == *Baku Metro == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Urbanrail - Baku Metro * Category:Railway stations in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Baku Category:Rail transport lists
title: List of Baku metro stations
